alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:36AM MST until March 09 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm Exiting the Area Today... .Snow will continue across much of the area early this morning, but then the snow will be ending from southwest to northeast. By early afternoon, most of the accumulating snow will will have moved east of the Black Hills. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
